page.title: 01Mr. Honeybun's Farm.
page.content: Mr Honeybun is a{farmer}at Meare on the Rice Farm.He is a dairy farmer and he owns 174 acres which he cuts twice a year for silage. Mr Honeybun has 126 cows which is 30 too many because of the EEC and the {government}cuts. To overcome this problem he feeds his cows less food so they produce less milk.His cows produce between 300 and 500 gallons a day.His milk goes to a manufacturing{dairy}at Evercreech which produces St.Ivel cream cheese. Mr Honeybun has to get up by 6.30am each morning for the first{milking.}He milks twice a day ,6.30am and 5.30pm. The farm is a family affair,his two sons help him,one is a permanent worker and the other only helps part- time.So for most of the time there are only two permanent workers.
